Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 町の人たちが祈りを捧げている。
Entry.EnglishText: The townsfolk are all praying.

Entry.JapaneseText:
<speed:00>『調和の像』 ヒューマとガジュマの調和を 表現した像。
「我々は、この像のもとで 調和と平和を願う」
台座の上にあったであろう像は 破壊されており、姿がない。
Entry.EnglishText:
<speed:00>- Statue of Harmony - A painting representing harmony between Huma and Gajumas.
"Under this statue, we shall wish for peace and harmony"
It seems like the statue above this pedestal has already been destroyed. There is nothing on top of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスに注意するんだ。 どこに現れてもおかしくない。
Entry.EnglishText: Keep an eye out for Viruses. Those slimy monsters can appear out-of-nowhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: 遠鳴りはそれほど珍しくない。 山の上のほうで、天気が荒れてる だけだと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: Distant roars are not really uncommon here because the mountain over there usually gets them, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアというヒューマの娘を 見かけたら、軍まで知らせてほしい。
Entry.EnglishText: Please tell the army immediately if you see a female Huma named Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街に住む、マウロという男が、 自分を海賊の子孫だと言っている そうだが……心配だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Some guy named Mauro did say that he was a descendant of some pirate, but... I wonder...

Entry.JapaneseText: せっかくスカラベを拘束して、 治安維持にあたっているのに、 何かよからぬ事を考えてなければ いいのだが……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd prefer it if you refrain from doing any mischief around here... Especially since we're working hard in maintaining the peace now that Scarabe's gone.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街の治安はよくない。 出歩く時は注意するように。
Entry.EnglishText: The peace and order of this town is currently unstable. Please keep your guard up when walking around town.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 争っていたはずの 人々が共に……
Entry.EnglishText: People who should have been working together are...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かあたたかく、心強い力が この広場にあふれているようだ。
Entry.EnglishText: For some reason, there's this really reassuring feeling spreading around the square.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か聞こえるような 気もするが…… 調べようもない事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I think I'm hearing things... I can't go and check it out, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: この先の屋敷の主人は カレギア軍によって 拘束されている。
この街に、海賊王の子孫が いると聞いたが…… どうにもうさんくさい話だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that there's someone around here who's a pirate's descendant. Sounds mega shady, if you ask me.

Entry.JapaneseText: もし本当にいるのなら、 スカラベでなく、その男が 街を仕切っていそうだが……
Entry.EnglishText: Coz if it's true, then shouldn't it be him who's supposed to be leading the town and not Scarabe?

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間の抗争を起こせば、 厳罰に処せられる。 言動には注意するように。
Entry.EnglishText: Cause an interspecies fight and you will be severely punished. Watch yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 住民たちが集まり始めてから、 この辺り一帯の空気が穏やかに なったような気がする。
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since that assembly happened, I can't help but feel like this area has gotten more peaceful.

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りが聞こえる？ 地面も揺れている？ 歩いているとわからんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Can you hear that rumbling? Is the ground shaking? I can't really tell.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアというヒューマの娘を 見かけなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did you see this Huma girl called Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: 伝説の海賊王アイフリードの 子孫がこの街にいるらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently one of the Pirate King Aifread's descendants are in this town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊王なら莫大な資産を 残したはずだが、この街には それらしき人物は見当たらない……
Entry.EnglishText: A Pirate King would have left a vast amount of treasure, but I don't see anyone who fits the bill.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街から見渡す山々は 本当に美しい景色ばかりだ。
Entry.EnglishText: That mountain range you see in the distance really is pretty.

Entry.JapaneseText: この景色の中で暮らしているのに なぜ、こんなにも人々の心は すさんでしまっているんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Makes me wonder why the people around here are like this, even when they're around such peaceful scenery.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りというのは、浅発地震や 火山活動などによって大地の振動が 空気に伝わって音が聞こえるものだ。
Entry.EnglishText: "Rumblings" are when sound from shallow earthquakes and volcanic activity gets transmitted through the air.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこかで、地震でも 起きているというのか……
Entry.EnglishText: Somewhere out there, there's an earthquake happening...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私がいる以上、ここでは 二度と事件は起こさせはしない。
Entry.EnglishText: As long as I'm here, no accident will ever happen again.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一般的に、右利きの人は 左回りのほうが動きやすいものだ。
Entry.EnglishText: In general, right-handed people find it easier to move counter-clockwise.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私はどちら利きか、 わかるかね？
Entry.EnglishText: Can you guess which is my dominant side?

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: ……えっと、ガジュマさんと お話しちゃいけないって、 お母さんが言ってたの……
Entry.EnglishText: Uhmm... My mom told me not to talk to Gajumas.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはね、 ミール広場っていうの。
Entry.EnglishText: This place is called the Mir Square!

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔の言葉で、ミールは 平和っていう意味だって お母さんが言ってたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: My mom told me that it means "peace" in the old language.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わぁ、お姫様みたいな ガジュマさん……！ でも、お話しちゃいけないの。 お母さんが言ってたから……
Entry.EnglishText: Wow! Miss Gajuma, you look like a pretty princess! Oh... But my mom told me I musn't talk to Gajumas...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマさんとは お話しちゃいけないの。 でも、どうしてかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: I not allowed to speak to Gajumas. I wonder why...?

Entry.JapaneseText: この広場にはね、前はね、 ヒューマさんとガジュマさんの 仲良くしてる銅像があったの。
Entry.EnglishText: You know, there used to be a bronze statue here with a Huma and Gajuma together!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、スカラベ様が、 壊しちゃったの……
Entry.EnglishText: But Lord Scarabe had it destroyed...

Entry.JapaneseText: この広場にはね、前はね、 ヒューマさんとガジュマさんの 仲良くしてる銅像があったの。
Entry.EnglishText: You know, there used to be a bronze statue here with a Huma and Gajuma together!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、スカラベ様が、 壊しちゃったの……
Entry.EnglishText: But Lord Scarabe had it destroyed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマさんとは お話しちゃいけないの。 でも、どうしてかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: I not allowed to speak to Gajumas. I wonder why...?

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、ガジュマさんたちが スカラベ様のお家のほうへ 行ったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: A lot of Gajumas headed towards Lord Scarabe's house over there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ヒューマとガジュマは お話しちゃいけないの。 でも、おじさんはヒューマと 仲良くしてる……変なの……
Entry.EnglishText: Humas and Gajumas shouldn't talk to each other. But... you're getting along with Humas. You're weird!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはガジュマと お話しちゃいけないのに、 明日、スカラベ様はガジュマさんと お話するんだって……変なの……
Entry.EnglishText: Humas musn't talk to Gajumas, but Lord Scarabe is going to talk to them tomorrow... Weird...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ヒューマとガジュマは お話しちゃいけないの。 でも、おじさんはヒューマと 仲良くしてる……変なの……
Entry.EnglishText: Humas and Gajumas shouldn't talk to each other. But... you're getting along with Humas. You're weird!

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、どうしてスカラベ様は 女王様を捕まえたの？ ガジュマだからなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, why did Lord Scarabe capture Her Majesty? Is it because she's a Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: えっとね、ミルハウストさんって いう、偉い将軍様がね、 ヒューマとガジュマは仲良く しなきゃいけないって言ってたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You know, there's this really important person called Milhaust. He said that Humas and Gajumas must get along with each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、私もガジュマさんと なかよくするの。
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I'll try to get along with Gajumas too!

Entry.JapaneseText: えっとね、私、みんな なかよくしたほうが 楽しいと思うの。
Entry.EnglishText: Uhm... I think it's more fun if everyone got along with each other!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、私もガジュマさんと なかよくするの。
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I'll try to get along with Gajumas too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何の音かなぁ？ カミナリが来るのかなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what this sound is? Is there going to be a thunderstorm?

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当、わかんない事 ばっかり……
Entry.EnglishText: I really don't know a lot...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてヒューマは、 ガジュマと仲良くしちゃ いけないのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Why are Humas not allowed to get along with Gajumas?

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coo Coo

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000022>どうも、この街の連中は ガジュマとヒューマが一緒なのが、 気に入らないみたいね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000022>Despite residing in the same town, it looks like the Huma and Gajuma here don't like each other very much.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000023>ちぇッ、ラジルダと同じってか。 ムナクソ悪い街だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000023>Tch, just like Razilda, huh? These places make me wanna barf!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000024>となると…… まともに話を聞けそうなのは、 スージーぐらいか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000024>If that's the case, then... Susie is probably the only person here whom we can turn to for help.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000073>どこへ行くんだ、クレア。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000073>Claire, where are you going?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000074>あ、あなたこそ…… 休まなくていいの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000074>I-I could ask the same thing... Wouldn't you rather rest?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000075>なんだか…… 落ち着かない気分なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000075>I can't seem to calm down, for some reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000076>わ、私もなの……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000076>W-well it is the same for me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000077>そうか…… 散歩でもしないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000077>I see. Why don't we go for a walk, then?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:30000079>ひとりで歩くのは物騒だ。 それに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:30000079>Going for a walk alone isn't always safe. Besides...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3000007a>「急がないと、キミは 大切なものを失う事になる！」
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3000007A>“If you don't hurry, <Veigue>, you'll lose something precious to you!”

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3000007c>行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3000007C>Just come with me.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d2>……本当に、本当に アガーテ様なのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D2>Lady Agarte...is that really you in there?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d3>人の心が入れ替わるなどという事が、 ありうるのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D3>How is it possible for someone to change bodies like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d4>……<Yellow>月のフォルス<White>…… 王家に伝わるそのフォルスを 使えば、可能なのです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D4>The <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>... The power of my ancestors made this possible...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d5><Yellow>月のフォルス<White>…… それがあれば……他人の身体を 手に入れられるというの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D5>The <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>... If you have this power, you can change your body to that of someone else?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d6>なぜ、そのような事を……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D6>Why would you do such a thing...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d8>なぜ、今まで黙って おられたのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D8>Why have you kept this hidden for so long?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d9>……ごめんなさい…… だますつもりはありませんでした…… でも……言えなかったのです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D9>I'm truly sorry. I had no intention of hiding it, but... I just couldn't bring myself to speak of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000da>陛下、おやめください…… 私が悪いのです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000DA>Your Majesty, please do not blame yourself. I am the one at fault.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000db>陛下がカレギア城に 戻っていらっしゃった時、 私が気づいてさしあげれば……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000DB>Perhaps if I had been able to recognize your true identity when you returned to Callegea Castle...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000dc>ミルハウスト……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000DC>Milhaust...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000dd>そういう問題かよ!! それでクレアさんが…… えっと、ホンモノのクレアさんが、 どんな目にあったか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000DD>I think you're missing the real issue here! What about Claire? Uh, the real Claire... Do you have any idea what kinda hell she must have been going through?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000de>陛下は、ご自分の身体が 生きているという事を ご存知だったのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000DE>Your Majesty, did you know your original body had survived?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000df>……ラジルダで気づいて…… キョグエンで捕まった時には、 隣の部屋に……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000DF>I realized it at Razilda. When I was captured in Kyogen, she was inside of the room next to mine.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e0>なんだって!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E0>What?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3000010c>じゃ、じゃあ、あんたはクレアさんが 連れて行かれたのを知ってて、 黙ってたって言うのかよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3000010C>You knew the real Claire was being held captive and you didn't say a damn word?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e1>ごめんなさい…… ごめんなさい…… ごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E1>I'm sorry. I'm sorry... I'm so sorry...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e2>皆さん、それ以上、 女王様を責めないでください。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E2>Please don't blame the Queen more than necessary, everyone.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e3>だけど……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E3>But she...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e4>見た目が変わったら、 周囲の反応も変わるものです。 本当の事を言いたくても 言えない事だってあります。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E4>When your appearance changes, the world around you changes with it. Even if you want to speak the truth, it isn't always so simple.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e5>私には、アガーテ様の つらい気持ちがわかります。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E5>I experienced it for myself... How hard it must have been for her.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e6>……とにかく、今すぐクレアに 身体を返してやってほしい。 今のオレの願いは、それだけだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E6>...You need to give Claire her body back. That's all I ask.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e7>私は……わたくしは……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E7>I...cannot...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e8>ごめんなさい…… 本当にごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E8>I'm so sorry... Forgive me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000e9>陛下!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000E9>Your Majesty!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000ea>なんだ、なんだ？ 一体、どうしたっていうんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000EA>Wait, what? Where does she think she's going?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000eb>とにかく、 オレたちも追うんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000EB>Come on, we need to follow her!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d3>人の心が入れ替わるなどという事が、 ありうるのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D3>How is it possible for someone to change bodies like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d4>……<Yellow>月のフォルス<White>…… 王家に伝わるそのフォルスを 使えば、可能なのです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D4>The <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>... The power of my ancestors made this possible...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:300000d6>なぜ、そのような事を……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000D6>Why would you do such a thing...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:32000028>そうだ、なぜそんな事をしたんだ!? なぜクレアがこんな事に……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:32000028>Why?! Why did you do that to Claire...?

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice
